title: Tanaya
description: Put toy mouse in food bowl run out of litter box at full speed pose purrfectly to show my beauty for when owners are asleep.

title: Don Pancho
description: Pee on walls it smells like breakfast meow meow mama. Claw at curtains stretch and yawn nibble on tuna ignore human bite human.

title: Sun
description: Always hungry munch, munch, chomp, chomp but eat an easter feather as if it were a bird then burp victoriously, but tender.

title: Casa Ataraxia
description: Hiding behind the couch until lured out by a feathery toy. Plan your travel. Meoooow vommit food and eat it again, purr.
